TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpUtility extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供在处理 Web 请求时用于编码和解码 URL 的方法。

span.span: Provides methods for encoding and decoding URLs when processing Web requests.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类在内部使用类，其方法和属性公开通过内部 ASP.NET对象。The class is used internally by the class, whose methods and properties are exposed through the intrinsic ASP.NET object. 此外，类包含编码和解码实用工具方法，用于不能从访问。Additionally, the class contains encoding and decoding utility methods that are not accessible from the . 若要对 Web 应用程序之外的值进行编码或解码，请使用 类。To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将，并方法的类。The following code example demonstrates the use of the , and methods of the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[HttpUtilityExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpUtilityExample/cs/httputilityexample.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HttpUtilityExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpUtilityExample/vb/httputilityexample.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类公开方法来编码和解码字符串基于 Url，URL 令牌和路径。The class exposes methods for encoding and decoding string based URLs, URL tokens, and paths. 在内部使用类。The is used internally by the class.

summary.span: 将字符串最小限度地转换为 HTML 编码的字符串。

span.span: Minimally converts a string to an HTML-encoded string.
An encoded string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将适用于插入的 HTML 特性值的字符编码。The method encodes characters appropriate for insertion into an HTML attribute value. 从字符串结果方法应只用于双引号中的特性。The string result from the method should be used only for double-quoted attributes. 使用时，可能会出现安全问题使用单引号属性的方法。Security issues might arise when using the method with single-quoted attributes.

A output stream.

summary.span: 将字符串最小限度地转换为 HTML 编码的字符串，并将编码的字符串发送到 输出流。

span.span: Minimally converts a string into an HTML-encoded string and sends the encoded string to a output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将转换仅引号 （"）、 与号 (&) 和左尖括号 (<) 到等效的字符实体。The method converts only quotation marks ("), ampersands (&), and left angle brackets (<) to equivalent character entities. 它是远远快于方法。It is considerably faster than the method. 从字符串结果方法应只用于双引号中的特性。The string result from the method should be used only for double-quoted attributes. 使用时，可能会出现安全问题使用单引号属性的方法。Security issues might arise when using the method with single-quoted attributes.

related.span: 如何： 防止脚本攻击 Web 应用程序中通过应用 HTML 编码为字符串

span.span: How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings

summary.span: 将已经为 HTTP 传输进行过 HTML 编码的字符串转换为已解码的字符串。

span.span: Converts a string that has been HTML-encoded for HTTP transmission into a decoded string.

summary.span: 若要对 Web 应用程序之外的值进行编码或解码，请使用 类。

span.span: To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the class.

span.span: The string to decode.

summary.span: 将已经为 HTTP 传输进行过 HTML 编码的字符串转换为已解码的字符串。

span.span: Converts a string that has been HTML-encoded for HTTP transmission into a decoded string.
A decoded string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 HTTP 流中传递空白和标点符号等字符，它们可能会错误地解释在接收端。If characters such as blanks and punctuation are passed in an HTTP stream, they might be misinterpreted at the receiving end. HTML 编码将转换为字符实体等效项; 不允许在 HTML 中的字符HTML 解码反转的编码。HTML encoding converts characters that are not allowed in HTML into character-entity equivalents; HTML decoding reverses the encoding. 例如，在嵌入的文本，字符块\<和 > 编码为`<`和`>`HTTP 传输。For example, when embedded in a block of text, the characters \< and > are encoded as `<` and `>` for HTTP transmission. 若要对 Web 应用程序之外的值进行编码或解码，请使用 类。To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示并方法的类。The following code example demonstrates the and methods of the class. 使用编码的输入的字符串方法。The input string is encoded using the method. 然后使用解码已编码的字符串获取方法。The encoded string obtained is then decoded using the method. [!code-csharp[HttpUtility_HtmlDecode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpUtility_HtmlDecode/CS/httputility_htmldecode.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HttpUtility_HtmlDecode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpUtility_HtmlDecode/VB/httputility_htmldecode.vb#1)]

.method public static hidebysig void HtmlDecode(string s, class System.IO.TextWriter output) cil managed
Public Shared Sub HtmlDecode (s As String, output As TextWriter)
public: static void HtmlDecode(System::String ^ s, System::IO::TextWriter ^ output);
static member HtmlDecode : string * System.IO.TextWriter -> unit

span.span: The string to decode.
A stream of output.

HTML 编码将转换为字符实体等效项; 不允许在 HTML 中的字符HTML 解码反转的编码。HTML encoding converts characters that are not allowed in HTML into character-entity equivalents; HTML decoding reverses the encoding. 例如，在嵌入的文本，字符块\<和 > 编码为`<`和`>`HTTP 传输。For example, when embedded in a block of text, the characters \< and > are encoded as `<` and `>` for HTTP transmission. 若要对 Web 应用程序之外的值进行编码或解码，请使用 类。To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the class.

HTML 编码将转换为字符实体等效项; 不允许在 HTML 中的字符HTML 解码反转的编码。HTML encoding converts characters that are not allowed in HTML into character-entity equivalents; HTML decoding reverses the encoding. 例如，在嵌入的文本，字符块\<和 >，编码为`<`和`>`HTTP 传输。For example, when embedded in a block of text, the characters \< and >, are encoded as `<` and `>` for HTTP transmission. 若要对 Web 应用程序之外的值进行编码或解码，请使用 类。To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the class.

related.span: 如何： 防止脚本攻击 Web 应用程序中通过应用 HTML 编码为字符串

span.span: How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings

summary.span: 对字符串进行编码。

span.span: Encodes a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法对字符串进行编码。This method encodes strings. 例如，单引号和双引号是作为包含`\'`和`\"`中编码的字符串。For instance, single quotation marks and double quotation marks are included as `\'` and `\"` in the encoded string. URL 编码可确保所有浏览器正确地传输 URL 字符串中的文本。URL encoding makes sure that all browsers correctly transmit text in URL strings. 可能会截断或某些浏览器已损坏等问号 （？）、 and 符 (&)、 斜杠 （/） 和空格字符。Characters such as a question mark (?), ampersand (&), slash (/), and spaces might be truncated or corrupted by some browsers. 因此，这些字符必须以编码`a`元素或查询字符串的字符串可以重新发送请求字符串中的浏览器中。Therefore, these characters must be encoded in `a` elements or in query strings where the strings can be re-sent by a browser in a request string.

.method public static hidebysig string JavaScriptStringEncode(string value) cil managed

static member JavaScriptStringEncode : string -> string

span.span: The query string to parse.

summary.span: 使用 编码将查询字符串分析成一个 。

span.span: Parses a query string into a using encoding.
A of query parameters and values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用格式来分析查询字符串中返回、 URL 编码字符进行解码和相同的查询字符串参数的多个匹配项作为单个条目所列用逗号分隔每个值。The method uses format to parse the query string In the returned , URL-encoded characters are decoded and multiple occurrences of the same query string parameter are listed as a single entry with a comma separating each value. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法使用查询字符串可能包含用户输入，这是潜在的安全威胁。The method uses query strings that might contain user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 相同的查询字符串变量的多个实例合并在返回的一个条目。Multiple occurrences of the same query string variable are consolidated in one entry of the returned . [!code-aspx-csharp[HttpUtility_ParseQueryString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpUtility_ParseQueryString/cs/httputility_parsequerystring.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HttpUtility_ParseQueryString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpUtility_ParseQueryString/vb/httputility_parsequerystring.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在返回、 URL 编码字符进行解码和相同的查询字符串参数的多个匹配项作为单个条目列出使用逗号分隔每个值。In the returned , URL-encoded characters are decoded and multiple occurrences of the same query string parameter are listed as a single entry with a comma separating each value. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法使用查询字符串可能包含用户输入，这是潜在的安全威胁。The method uses query strings that might contain user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).

summary.span: 将已编码用于 URL 传输的字符串转换为解码的字符串。

A decoded string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 HTTP 流中传递空白和标点符号等字符，它们可能会错误地解释在接收端。If characters such as blanks and punctuation are passed in an HTTP stream, they might be misinterpreted at the receiving end. URL 编码将转换为字符实体等效项; 不允许在 URL 中使用的字符URL 解码反转的编码。URL encoding converts characters that are not allowed in a URL into character-entity equivalents; URL decoding reverses the encoding. 例如，在嵌入在 URL 中，字符要传输的文本块\<和 > 编码为 %3c 和 %3e。For example, when embedded in a block of text to be transmitted in a URL, the characters \< and > are encoded as %3c and %3e. 若要对 Web 应用程序之外的值进行编码或解码，请使用 类。To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the class.

URL 编码将转换为字符实体等效项; 不允许在 URL 中使用的字符URL 解码反转的编码。URL encoding converts characters that are not allowed in a URL into character-entity equivalents; URL decoding reverses the encoding. 例如，在嵌入在 URL 中，字符要传输的文本块\<和 > 编码为 %3c 和 %3e。For example, when embedded in a block of text to be transmitted in a URL, the characters \< and > are encoded as %3c and %3e. 若要对 Web 应用程序之外的值进行编码或解码，请使用 类。To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 HTTP 流中传递空白和标点符号等字符，它们可能会错误地解释在接收端。If characters such as blanks and punctuation are passed in an HTTP stream, they might be misinterpreted at the receiving end. URL 编码将转换为字符实体等效项; 不允许在 URL 中使用的字符URL 解码反转的编码。URL encoding converts characters that are not allowed in a URL into character-entity equivalents; URL decoding reverses the encoding. 例如，当嵌入在 URL 中传输的文本块中的字符\<和 > 编码为 %3c 和 %3e。For example, when embedded in a block of text to be transmitted in a URL the characters \< and > are encoded as %3c and %3e. 若要对 Web 应用程序之外的值进行编码或解码，请使用 类。To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the class.

\- or -

span.span: is less than , or + is greater than the length of the array.

summary.span: 将字节数组转换为编码的 URL 字符串。

span.span: Converts a byte array into an encoded URL string.
An encoded string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可用来编码整个 URL，包括查询字符串值。The method can be used to encode the entire URL, including query-string values. 如果 HTTP 流中传递空白和标点符号等字符，它们可能会错误地解释在接收端。If characters such as blanks and punctuation are passed in an HTTP stream, they might be misinterpreted at the receiving end. URL 编码将转换为字符实体等效项; 不允许在 URL 中使用的字符URL 解码反转的编码。URL encoding converts characters that are not allowed in a URL into character-entity equivalents; URL decoding reverses the encoding. 例如，当字符\<和 > 嵌入在要在 URL 中传输的文本块中，它们编码为 %3c 和 %3e。For example, when the characters \< and > are embedded in a block of text to be transmitted in a URL, they are encoded as %3c and %3e. 若要对 Web 应用程序之外的值进行编码或解码，请使用 类。To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the class.

related.span: 如何： 防止脚本攻击 Web 应用程序中通过应用 HTML 编码为字符串

span.span: How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings

MemberSignature.Value: public static string UrlEncode (string str);

Public Shared Function UrlEncode (str As String) As String
public: static System::String ^ UrlEncode(System::String ^ str);
static member UrlEncode : string -> string

span.span: The text to encode.

summary.span: 对 URL 字符串进行编码。

span.span: Encodes a URL string.
An encoded string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可用来编码整个 URL，包括查询字符串值。The method can be used to encode the entire URL, including query-string values. 如果空白和标点符号等字符无需编码即可传递 HTTP 流中的它们可能会错误地解释在接收端。If characters such as blanks and punctuation are passed in an HTTP stream without encoding, they might be misinterpreted at the receiving end. URL 编码将转换为字符实体等效项; 不允许在 URL 中使用的字符URL 解码反转的编码。URL encoding converts characters that are not allowed in a URL into character-entity equivalents; URL decoding reverses the encoding. 例如，当字符\<和 > 嵌入在要在 URL 中传输的文本块中，它们编码为 %3c 和 %3e。For example, when the characters \< and > are embedded in a block of text to be transmitted in a URL, they are encoded as %3c and %3e. 可以对使用的 URL 进行编码方法或方法。You can encode a URL using with the method or the method. 但是，这些方法返回不同的结果。However, the methods return different results. 方法将每个空格字符转换为加号字符 （+）。The method converts each space character to a plus character (+). 方法将为每个空格字符到字符串"%20"，它表示空间以十六进制表示法。The method converts each space character into the string "%20", which represents a space in hexadecimal notation. 使用方法时才能确保一致的已解码的 URL，无论哪一个平台或浏览器编码 URL 的路径部分执行解码。Use the method when you encode the path portion of a URL in order to guarantee a consistent decoded URL, regardless of which platform or browser performs the decoding. 方法使用 utf-8 编码，方法是默认值。The method uses UTF-8 encoding by default. 因此，使用方法提供了与使用相同的结果方法并指定第二个参数。Therefore, using the method provides the same results as using the method and specifying as the second parameter. 为方便地访问方法在运行时从 ASP.NET 应用程序。 is a convenient way to access the method at run time from an ASP.NET application. 在内部，使用方法对字符串进行编码。Internally, uses the method to encode strings. 若要对 Web 应用程序之外的值进行编码或解码，请使用 类。To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the class.

related.span: 如何： 防止脚本攻击 Web 应用程序中通过应用 HTML 编码为字符串

span.span: How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings

URL 编码将转换为字符实体等效项; 不允许在 URL 中使用的字符URL 解码反转的编码。URL encoding converts characters that are not allowed in a URL into character-entity equivalents; URL decoding reverses the encoding. 例如，当字符\<和 > 嵌入在要在 URL 中传输的文本块中，它们编码为 %3c 和 %3e。For example, when the characters \< and > are embedded in a block of text to be transmitted in a URL, they are encoded as %3c and %3e. 若要对 Web 应用程序之外的值进行编码或解码，请使用 类。To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the class.

summary.span: 将字节数组转换为 URL 编码的字节数组，从数组中指定位置开始，以指定字节数继续。

span.span: Converts an array of bytes into a URL-encoded array of bytes, starting at the specified position in the array and continuing for the specified number of bytes.
An encoded array of bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 HTTP 流中传递空白和标点符号等字符，它们可能会错误地解释在接收端。If characters such as blanks and punctuation are passed in an HTTP stream, they might be misinterpreted at the receiving end. URL 编码将转换为字符实体等效项; 不允许在 URL 中使用的字符URL 解码反转的编码。URL encoding converts characters that are not allowed in a URL into character-entity equivalents; URL decoding reverses the encoding. 例如，在嵌入在 URL 中，字符要传输的文本块\<和 > 编码为 %3c 和 %3e。For example, when embedded in a block of text to be transmitted in a URL, the characters \< and > are encoded as %3c and %3e. 若要对 Web 应用程序之外的值进行编码或解码，请使用 类。To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the class.

span.span: is , but does not equal .

exception.span: 小于 或大于 数组的长度。

span.span: is less than or greater than the length of the array.
\- or -

exception.span: 小于 ，或 + 大于 数组的长度。

span.span: is less than , or + is greater than the length of the array.

related.span: 如何： 防止脚本攻击 Web 应用程序中通过应用 HTML 编码为字符串

span.span: How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 HTTP 流中传递空白和标点符号等字符，它们可能会错误地解释在接收端。If characters such as blanks and punctuation are passed in an HTTP stream, they might be misinterpreted at the receiving end. URL 编码的字符实体等效项; 指向的 URL 中无效的字符转换URL 解码反转的编码。URL encoding converts characters that are not valid in a URL to character-entity equivalents; URL decoding reverses the encoding. 例如，在嵌入在 URL 中，字符要传输的文本块\<和 > 编码为 %3c 和 %3e。For example, when embedded in a block of text to be transmitted in a URL, the characters \< and > are encoded as %3c and %3e.
